org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.buffer.allocation

Interface MemoryStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PageableArrayMemoryStrategy, PageableDirectBufferMemoryStrategy, PinnedMemoryStrategy

    public interface MemoryStrategy
    An allocation strategy handles allocating and freeing memory for the gpu (usually relative to the compute capabilities of the gpu)

    • Method Summary
